page.title: 11CLUBS & SOCIETIES,DUNVANT.
page.content: {Dunvant Women's Institute.}With a current membership in the region of sixty,weekly meetings are held in the local Community Centre.Talks on arts and crafts,and films about nature and foreign travel form part of a varied programme of activities.Each year members put on entertainment for the young and older inhabitants of the village, such as a pantomime. {Dunvant Drama Group.} Although a small group,consisting of about fifteen members, their enthusiasm compensates for lack of numbers and their well-presented productions are always enthusiastic- ally supported by the village community.Rehearsals are held weekly in the Community Centre,the venue also for their productions. {Scout,Guide and Brownie Groups}are well supported by local children.
